Package storesystem.api

Class ShoppingCart

java.lang.Object
storesystem.api.ShoppingCart
public class ShoppingCart
extends java.lang.Object
The shopping cart object. Can only be used once after completion of the transaction

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    Inventory ShopInventory
    the Inventory object this will get data from
    java.util.ArrayList<ItemOrder> shoppingcart
    the ArrayList of ItemOrder objects
    double TaxPercent
    The tax to apply.

  • Field Details

    • shoppingcart

      public java.util.ArrayList<ItemOrder> shoppingcart
      the ArrayList of ItemOrder objects

    • ShopInventory

      public final Inventory ShopInventory
      the Inventory object this will get data from

    • TaxPercent

      public double TaxPercent
      The tax to apply. default is 10%

  • Constructor Details

    • ShoppingCart

      public ShoppingCart​(Inventory ShopInventory)
      create the shopping cart object
      Parameters:
      ShopInventory - the inventory object

  • Method Details

    • addItem

      public void addItem​(Item item) throws NotEnoughInOfStockException
      Adds a shopping cart order according to the name of the item
      Parameters:
      item - the item to add
      Throws:
      NotEnoughInOfStockException - if not enough is in stock to purchase the selected quantity.

    • addItems

      public void addItems​(ItemOrder addItemOrder) throws NotEnoughInOfStockException
      Adds an itemOrder to the shopping cart of the item
      Parameters:
      addItemOrder - the ItemOrder to add
      Throws:
      NotEnoughInOfStockException - if not enough is in stock to purchase the selected quantity.

    • hasItem

      public boolean hasItem​(Item item)
      detects if an item is in the shopping cart
      Parameters:
      item - the item to test for
      Returns:
      whether the item was found or not

    • removeItem

      public boolean removeItem​(Item item)
      Removes one specific item from shopping cart
      Parameters:
      item - the item to remove
      Returns:
      true if the item was removed

    • removeItems

      public boolean removeItems​(ItemOrder removeItemOrder)
      Removes specific item from shopping cart
      Parameters:
      removeItemOrder - itemOrder to remove will not remove if is bigger than what is in cart
      Returns:
      whether it has been removed or not

    • resetValues

      protected void resetValues()
      reset values to recalculate

    • removeItems

      public boolean removeItems​(Item item, int quantity)
      Removes specific amount of items from shopping cart. Will not remove if quantity exceeds the cart.
      Parameters:
      item - the item to remove
      quantity - the number to remove
      Returns:
      true if was removed

    • calculateTax

      public double calculateTax()
      calculates the tax if not already done so. this will call calculateTotal(). WARNING: adding or removing objects will invalidate this.
      Returns:
      the amount that tax will add

    • calculateTotal

      public double calculateTotal()
      calculates the total with deals applied if not already done so. WARNING: adding or removing objects will invalidate this.
      Returns:
      the amount that tax will add

    • findDeals

      public CartDeals findDeals()
      finds out what deals are available at moment of call. WARNING: adding or removing objects will invalidate this.
      Returns:
      the Cart deals

    • calculateFinalTotal

      public double calculateFinalTotal()
      calculates the final total. This runs calculateTotal() and calculateTax(). WARNING: adding or removing objects will invalidate this.
      Returns:
      the final total that will be payed for

    • getItemOrders

      public java.util.List<ItemOrder> getItemOrders()
      gets a unmodifiable list of the ItemOrders in this object
      Returns:
      the unmodifiable list

    • completeTransaction

      public CartDeals completeTransaction()
      Complete the transaction
      Returns:
      the deals that where applied. if any

    • isCompleted

      public boolean isCompleted()
      returns whether or not this ShoppingCart has completed its transaction by running
      Returns:
      true if completed

    • searchItem

      public boolean searchItem​(ItemOrder searchOrder)
      Searches for item in shopping cart
      Parameters:
      searchOrder - order to search for
      Returns:
      if the ItemOrder was found

    • getTotalCost

      public double getTotalCost()
      Get total cost of shopping cart
      Returns:
      the sum of all the ItemOrder objects

    • getItemOrder

      public ItemOrder getItemOrder​(Item item)
      gets the ItemOrder object for the Item
      Parameters:
      item - the item to use to find the ItemOrder
      Returns:
      the ItemOrder that was found

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      to string
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object
